column2: Fun filters and playlist maker for listening to daily soundtracks in the archive!
Now you can listen to the daily soundtrack in a cute little music player
Made it so pressing back just removes the pop-up instead of going to the previous page
Added infinite scrolling to the long pages
Added a 'read more' button to longer posts
Added regional variants and lots of filters to the pokemon ranking
Added the few TV shows I've actually seen to the films page
Hosted all the images and mp3s away from the assets folder
Added a ranking for every Pokemon!
Added filters to the daily soundtracks page
Added a stamp for whether I completed a game or not
Fixed a bug now you can put your own hex code in the color picker
Revolutionised the links bar at the top
Protected the gallery answers in the database
Now you can react to everything on the website!
Wrote some impassioned reviews of Cancionera Blue Prince and Fire Emblem Awakening
Beefed up the music section a bit
Unmasked gallery images when you get the answer right
New content: nintendo soundtracks and films
New content: bunch of stuff after my holiday
Added cross stitches page and also a secret page
Revolutionised the smash bros characters page
Added Mario Kart World rankings and some other general content
Every game I've ever played is now in the games section!
New content: games - improved the filters too
Games are now finally in the correct order
Now you can change the colour of the homepage!
New spotify playlist: My history of British music!
New content: finished the smash characters page!
Added rankings of every Mario Kart track ever
Refactored a whole bunch of stuff and can click away from pop-ups now
Added Fab's game of life to the community page
Added Fraser's opinions to Durstloescher page
Made a list of every game I've ever played and added release year to games section
Better image loading and new colour scheme
Added back ups to the database
Connected Nginx and deployed the app in production mode!
Added films and games I want to watch and play
Updated homepage with random image of me
Added smash page and DJ World Peace page and links page
Added the gallery and updated homepage
Adjusted CSS in albums and nintendo section
Set up the mp3 downloads section
